faqs.heading: FAQs About Santa Giving Gift Video

questions.question: What is the Santa Giving Gift Video effect?
questions.answer: The Santa Giving Gift Video is a fun AI effect that turns your photo into a heartwarming video. Upload a picture, and Santa appears giving a gift to the person in your photo.

questions.question: Can I use a photo with multiple people?
questions.answer: The effect works best with one person or pet in the photo. Using a group photo may not give the best results, as the AI focuses on one main subject.

questions.question: Can I add text or stickers to my video?
questions.answer: Currently, the video effect doesn’t include text or stickers. You can add them later using video editing apps after downloading your video.

questions.question: Will the video work on all devices?
questions.answer: Yes! The final MP4 video can be played on any device, including Windows, Mac, iPhone, Android, and tablets.

questions.question: Can I re-edit a video after it’s generated?
questions.answer: No, once the video is generated, it can’t be re-edited in the tool. You can generate a new video if you want changes.
